workflow.name: Automated email management with Gemini AI: Gmail summarizing, labeling and Notion/Sheets logging
workflow.description:
### AI Email Manager: Auto Summary, Labeling, and CRM Logging via n8n + Gemini

### Overview

This workflow turns your Gmail inbox into a fully autonomous AI Email Agent that reads, summarizes, categorizes, and organizes emails in real-time.
Built with n8n, Google Gemini, Notion, and Google Sheets, it‚Äôs perfect for founders, freelancers, and agencies who receive a ton of emails daily and want to automate the triage process without losing control.

##### How It Works

1. Gmail Trigger ‚Äî Detects new incoming emails.

2. Process Email Data ‚Äî Extracts sender info, subject, and content in a clean structured format.

3. AI Email Analyzer ‚Äî Uses Gemini AI to summarize the email and decide the most relevant label (e.g., Project Updates, Client Requests, Invoices, etc.).

4. Create Gmail Label (if not exists) ‚Äî Dynamically creates a new label if the AI recommends one that doesn‚Äôt exist.

5. AI Agent + Add Label to Email ‚Äî Applies the correct Gmail label automatically using the message ID.

6. Logs in Notion & Google Sheets ‚Äî Every processed email (summary, sender, date, label) is logged for tracking and analytics.


Who It‚Äôs For

- Entrepreneurs & Founders ‚Äî Manage investor, client, and product update emails automatically.
- Agencies & Teams ‚Äî Classify and track client emails effortlessly across projects.
- Freelancers & Consultants ‚Äî Get AI summaries and organize leads without manually labeling emails.
- Tech Builders ‚Äî Anyone building AI automation tools and SaaS products around inbox management.

parameters.text:
=You are an intelligent email assistant. Analyze the following email and perform these tasks:

1. Create a comprehensive summary of the email without removing any essential information
2. Determine the most appropriate label category for this email from the following options:
   - Work
   - Personal
   - Finance
   - Marketing/Promotional
   - Newsletter
   - Important
   - Follow-up Required
   - Project Updates
   - Meeting/Calendar
   - Support/Customer Service
   - Social
   - Travel
   - Bills/Invoices
   - Spam

If none of these labels fit perfectly, suggest a new label that would be most appropriate.

Email Details:
From: {{ $json['Sender Name'] }} ({{ $json['Sender Email'] }})
Subject: {{ $json.Subject }}
Content: {{ $json.Content }}
Has Attachments: {{ $json['Has Attachments'] }}

Provide your response in the following JSON format:
{
  "summary": "detailed summary here",
  "suggestedLabel": "label name",
  "createNewLabel": true/false,
  "priority": "high/medium/low",
  "actionRequired": true/false,
  "keyPoints": ["point1", "point2"]
}

parameters.content:
# Gmail Trigger and Email Process

## - Gmail Trigger Node 
- Triggers on every message (default).
- You can change on how often it triggers (default 59 mins)

## - Process Email Data
- Takes out essential data from the email received

# AI Node
## You can choose your
## own favourite LLM

# Email Ananlyzer

### Analyzes the email received, summarizes the whole email and suggests the most specific label for the mail

# Creates Label

### Creates the label received by **AI Email Analyzer Node**

### If label is already there, the workflow continues

# AI Label Assigner

### Gets the label and forward the appropriate Label Code for the Email received

# Add the Label

**NOTE:** Only add the **Label ID** or else the workflow will fail
# Logging the details in G-Sheet and Notion
